tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE music_repertoire (
    student_id INT,
    composition_id INT,
    composer_name VARCHAR(255),
    composition_title VARCHAR(255),
    studied_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Repertoire (
  repertoire_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  composition_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Students(student_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (composition_id) REFERENCES Compositions(composition_id)
);
